For obvious reasons standard HTML code cannot be used in posts. Instead YaBB allows the use of Universal Bulletin Board Code (UBBC) in posts. UBBC is similar to HTML, but safe—and standardized—for bulletin board use.

Type This For This
[hr]
[url=http://site.com]SITE[/url] SITE
[url]http://site.com[/url] http://site.com
[img]http://site.com/image.gif[/img]
[b]Bold[/b] Bold
[i]Italic[/i] Italic
[u]Underlined[/u] Underlined
[color=Red]Red text[/color] Red text
[quote]Quoted text[/quote]
Quoted text
[fixed]Fixed text[/fixed] Fixed text
[sup]Superscript[/sup] Superscript
[sub]Subscript[/sub] Subscript
[center]Centered text[/center]
Centered text
[list]
[*]Item
[/list]
  • Item
[pre]Preformatted text[/pre] 
Preformatted text
[code]Piece of code[/code]
code:
Piece of code
